author: silviodonato
body:
See issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29216 .
The wf 310, 311, 312 were added with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29032. They use as pileup dataset `/RelValHydjetQ_B12_5020GeV_2021/CMSSW_10_6_0-106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4-v1/GEN-SIM`, but this dataset does not exist. This causes errors in the integration build tests. 
A specific pileup dataset will be generated after `CMSSW_11_1_0_pre5` using wf 159.
This PR disables the wf 310, 311, 312 because they are crashing. They will be restored as soon as the new pileup dataset `/RelValHydjetQ_B12_5020GeV_2021/CMSSW_11_1_0_pre5-111X_upgrade2018_realistic_vX-vY/GEN-SIM`  will be ready (after `CMSSW_11_1_0_pre5`)
title: Disable temporarily workflow 310, 311, 312
